channel.title: news on Anarchy Linux
channel.description: Recent content in news on Anarchy Linux

item.title: Telegram group
item.description: I’m announcing the creation of a discussion group in the Telegram instant messaging service. We invite you to join the group by clicking on this link to discuss new ideas and features to be implemented in future releases. Together we can make Anarchy more than just an installer! We’re hoping to see you soon!
